entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Lansdowne House
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:29 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -24.4°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
